name: Don't Pee Your Pants (CashThulhu)
description:
It's a fine line! Drink the water so you can keep running but don't drink too much without hitting a toilet! 

Much like real life, drink water, use the bathroom every chance you get, and avoid prickly cacti!

Get more points to run faster and in turn, get points faster. How far will you go?

Good luck and stay dry, friends!
